"They say you die twice . Once when you stop breathing and the second , a bit later on , when somebody mentions your name for the last time . " What happens when the latter comes before the former ?
A day in the life of a beet cop, not to be confused with a beat cop
You go camping with your family just to find a bigfoot family also camping in the woods .
A Barista has given you a Double Chocolate Chip Crème Frappuccino with soy instead of a Caffè Vanilla Light Frappuccino with no fat milk. Make this as tragic , heart-wrenching and miserable as possible .
You 're a Photographer who is able to stop time . You use that power to make incredible pictures ... tell me about it !
